ComicInfo.Title: Day of Blood Part Four of Five
ComicInfo.Summary: Day of Blood Part Four of Five: Work learns that Kahless has converted Alexander to his Red Path army, and Worf and Alexander battle while Sisko confronts Kahless. Meanwhile in orbit, the Theseus is under attack by Romulan warships and B'Elanna and Tom lead the Defiant to aid the Theseus. They are surprised to learn who is commanding the Romulan ships against them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-14 09:29:44. [CVDB1012339] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:00:26. [Issue ID 2566769]
